Class GStepwise

All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, org.hs.util.Copy, GExpression, GStatement, at.dms.compiler.PhylumListener, Serializable
public class GStepwise
extends GConstruct
implements GExpression, GStatement

A stepwise operator, one of:

++i, --i, i++, i--

See Also:
Serialized Form
